provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Sugar Cane Farmers shorttitle

           PART I. incorporation and General Powers

    after referred to as “the Association”).
           (2) The Association may sue and be sued in such
    name, and shall have perpetual succession and a common
,   seal, and may from time to time make, change, alter and
    renew, such seal.
           (3) Every person who was on the 1st day of
    December, 1941, a member of the unincorporated organiza-
    tion known as the All-Island Jamaica Cane Farmers Asso-
    ciation shall become a member of the Association with such
    rights and privileges, and on such terms and conditions,
    as may be provided in the rules to be made under this Act.
           (4) Every person registered as a cane farmer under
    the Sugar Industry Control Act prior to 25th December,
    1941, and every person who may thereafter be registered as
    a cane farmer shall be deemed to have become a member
    of the Association upon such date or upon the date of his
    registration as a cane farmer, as the case may be.
